## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e212ce9343535d644b46e13584a4a6c0585b2c5482091ca23ea52068b582048e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'crypto-utility' @ 0.3.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
